code: import React from'react';import'./Hero.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hero1=_ref=>{let{setCurrentPage,prev,next}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hello, I'm Sarvagya"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Student"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"University of California, Berkeley"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button about-me",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(1),children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button experiences",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(2),children:"Experiences"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button projects",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(3),children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button research",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(4),children:"Research"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button contact",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(5),children:"Contact"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-hint top-hint",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(5),children:prev}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-hint bottom-hint",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(1),children:next})]});};export default Hero1;
